input: Translate English to Klingon: Hello world
Translate English to Klingon: Good morning
Translate English to Klingon: What is your name?
Translate English to Klingon: How old are you?
Translate English to Klingon: What day of week is today?
Translate English to Klingon: What time is it?
Translate English to Klingon: Can you speak English?
Translate English to Klingon: Where is the bathroom?
Translate English to Klingon: Why is the sky blue?
Translate English to Klingon: I want to learn Klingon
Translate English to Klingon: Nice to meet you
